revised_title: Extreme Ultraviolet Picosecond Pulses Generation and Applications
tldr: This article discusses the generation of extreme ultraviolet picosecond pulses using nonlinear optical frequency conversion techniques. It explores various laser systems, nonlinear media, and interaction types to generate coherent radiation in the extreme ultraviolet range. The article also highlights the potential applications and limitations of these techniques, as well as the future developments in the field.
